none: Eye Of Nix - Eye Of Nix demo 2013
Eye Of Nix - Eye Of Nix demo 2013

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 06, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
Sometimes it's best to not describe things, but to just be blown away by them. Seattle's EYE OF NIX are a truly unique combination, a swarm of gloom and sound fronted by pure power. So heavy...and so weird. EYE OF NIX
